subject: Issues with Vam PRO and Pedals
description_text:
Hi,

So after quite a long wait I got the VAM Pros (+ new Control Box) to pair
with my Plus Pedals.
Installed everything and calibrated.

I use Simhub to get the Telemetry to connect iRacing to the Vam Pro's
However as soon as I am ingame (iRacing) and hit the throttle for example
and the vam pro's start rattling, the throttle gets cut off. Same when
hitting and the brakes with ABS. When turning off the vam pros in simhub,
the throttle and brakes work fine (however obviously the VAM Pros don't).

I did not manage to use Simsonn Simmanager Pro to work with iRacing...

Please help me :)

Greetings
Daniel

conversations.body_text: 你好，Daniel Kappler，  请问您的订单号是多少？您使用的是哪款控制盒？ VAM Pro 电机在发货前经过严格测试，正常使用不会损坏。 我们会检查您控制板的版本，以确定是否需要固件更新——尤其是 ProX 控制盒，它通常需要固件更新。

Hi,

Thank you for coming back to me. This is the order number:

Order #SSN1819

I have not updated the firmware yet. I am using the 2.0.8 version of the
SIM manager software.

Greetings
Daniel

service@simsonn.com

Have you had a chance to look into this? If this problem can't be fixed I
will need to return the motors.

Greetings
Daniel

Am So., 13. Juli 2025 um 08:12 Uhr schrieb Daniel Kappler <
dakappler@gmail.com>:

> Hi,
>
> Thank you for coming back to me. This is the order number:
>
> Order #SSN1819
>
> I have not updated the firmware yet. I am using the 2.0.8 version of the
> SIM manager software.
>
> Greetings
> Daniel
>
> service@simsonn.com

Hi Daniel Kappler,  In the “Settings – Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the prox.sfu file to update. After the update, please test the device again.

Thx. I did this but it did not help. What helped was using a ground wire
(which I had provide and solder myself) and connect the box and pedals...
So problem seems to be fixed

service@simsonn.com
